CustomField.description: This Field has To be Referred Into the Email Template Subject
CustomField.formula: IF( OR( Account__r.Parent_SAGE_ID__c="PARK2005", Account__r.SAGE_Code__c = "PARK2005") , Account__r.Name &" - Hentland Ltd Credit Note "& Credit_Note_Number__c , "Hentland Ltd Credit Note "& Credit_Note_Number__c &" for "&Account__r.Name )
CustomField.label: Credit Note Email Subject
